metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16707 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Hunspell 1.7.0 has an invalid read operation in SuggestMgr::leftcommonsubstring in suggestmgr.cxx.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> doesn't look like suggestmgr.cxx is built in firefox package

criterions.comment: calibre: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
